        AdminReviews getAllReviews(AdminDataDescriptor dataDesc)
                    throws org.apache.torque.TorqueException,
                           com.workingdogs.village.DataSetException,
                           KKAdminException
        Calls the getReviewsPerProduct method with a negative productId value so that it is not included in the Where clause of the query

        Returns:

                             java.sql.Connection connection)
                      throws java.lang.Exception

      • insertReview

        int insertReview(AdminReview review)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        A new review is inserted. If the customerId on the review is 0 the name used for the review will be the customerName passed in on the review. If the customerId on the review is not 0 the name used for the review will be calculated by looking up the customer with the specified customerId then formatting the customer's name according to the definition of the NAME_FORMAT_TEMPLATE. Therefore, if the customerId is not 0 it must be the Id of a customer otherwise an Exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        review - the review
        Returns:
        Review Primary Key
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • deleteReviewsPerVendor

        void deleteReviewsPerVendor(int vendorId,
                            java.sql.Connection connection)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete the reviews for the vendor identified by the vendorId. If connection is not equal to null, it is used so that this delete may be part of a transaction started somewhere else.
        Parameters:
        vendorId - the vendorId
        connection - the connection
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception
